Uses of Class
Exceptions.NotAvailableOfferException

  • Packages that use NotAvailableOfferException 
    Package Description
    Application  
    Offer  

    • Uses of NotAvailableOfferException in Application

      Methods in Application that throw NotAvailableOfferException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Application.cancelOffer(Offer o)
      Method that is used by the host to cancel his own offer if it is not reserved or bought yet.

    • Uses of NotAvailableOfferException in Offer

      Methods in Offer that throw NotAvailableOfferException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Offer.approveOffer()
      Approve an offer which was waiting to be approved.
      void Offer.askForChanges(java.lang.String text)
      Ask for changes on an offer in case the Administrator consider it is not valid to be published.
      void Offer.buyOffer(RegisteredUser guest, java.lang.String subject)
      Buy an offer so that it is marked as BOUGHT, its Guest is set to guest, and the offer is added to the guest's bought/reserved offers list (in case it was not added before).
      void Offer.denyOffer()
      Deny an offer which the administrator consider it is not valid, or because it is not reserved an the host wants to remove it.
      void Offer.reserveOffer(RegisteredUser guest)
      Reserve an offer so that it is marked as RESERVED, its Guest is set to guest, and the offer is added to the guest's bought/reserved offers list.
      void Offer.setDeposit(double d)
      Setter of the offer's deposit in case the administrator asks for changes on the offer.
      void HolidayOffer.setEndDate(java.time.LocalDate d)
      Setter of the offer's ending date in case the administrator asks for changes on the offer.
      void Offer.setHouse(House h)
      Setter of the offer's house in case the administrator asks for changes on the offer.
      void LivingOffer.setNumberMonths(int n)
      Setter of the offer's number of months in case the administrator asks for changes on the offer.
      void LivingOffer.setPricePerMonth(double d)
      Setter of the offer's price per month in case the administrator asks for changes on the offer.
      void Offer.setStartDate(java.time.LocalDate l)
      Setter of the offer's starting date in case the administrator asks for changes on the offer.
      void HolidayOffer.setTotalPrice(double t)
      Setter of the offer's total price date in case the administrator asks for changes on the offer.
